name: DSL Evaluation Rules v1
description: Procedural compatibility rules for DSL-based claims

temporal_ordering.description: Claim timestamp must precede evidence timestamp

hash_integrity.description: All hashes must be valid SHA256 (64 hex chars)

dsl_structure_validation.description: Claim DSL must conform to v1.0.0 schema

evidence_envelope_validation.description: Evidence must have valid envelope v1 with signature

deterministic_evaluation.description: Same inputs must produce identical verdict
